job_description: Principal AI Solutions Development Engineer Technological advancements continue to empower human progress to newer heights and innovations in the space of Artificial Intelligence (AI) are at the pinnacle of this transformation. Dell Technologies is at the center of this “empowering the possible” in every sector and vertical such technological solutions and products has a role to play. With Generative AI (GenAI) led momentum in the industry, Dell Technologies remains at the forefront by helping solve customer challenges with its industry leading products and solutions. Dell Technologies’ Integrated Solutions brings Dell and partner hardware and software products together in the form of reference and validated designs. These designs, paired with various services offers, allow customers to embark on the AI and GenAI journey with confidence, irrespective of their starting point in this transformational journey. Our Solutions Development Engineers operate at the cutting edge of technological advancements. We design and develop AI and GenAI solutions integrating GPU accelerated compute, network and storage products, in Slurm and Kubernetes clustered environments, allowing data scientists and developers to develop, fine tune, customize and deploy (for inference) AI models towards various use-cases and deployment environments (core, edge, cloud and anything in between). Join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact as a Principal AI Solutions Development Engineer on our AI Solutions Engineering Team in Austin, Texas. What you’ll achieve As a Principal AI Solutions Development Engineer, you will be r esponsible for the engineering work necessary to develop Dell Integrated Solutions based on the Generative AI-based compute, network, and storage infrastructure environment. You will work closely with multiple Dell stakeholders to ensure all engineering solutions projects align with Dell Technologies’ AI strategy. You will: Review requirements and develop test plans based on the Generative AI solution specifications and Product Manager’s Product Requirements Document Configure, deploy and test AI workloads running on the Generative AI environment; critical responsibilities of the role are to troubleshoot and resolve issues, conduct technical reviews of all deliverables and continually communicate project status to all relevant stakeholders Review and analyze internal and external engineering-specific documentation related to projects; you will share knowledge with peers and leaders to improve internal processes and drive ideas to streamline future development work Utilize your expertise to assist in the development of sales maker, customer and partner content e.g. sizing guides, design guides, technical white papers, implementation guides, technical blogs Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role: Essential Requirements 5+ years’ industry experience; experience developing and deploying end-to-end (infrastructure to platform to application to workload to use-cases) solutions is highly desired Knowledge in infrastructure deployment and the hardware ecosystem e.g. servers, storage and networking (to include IP addressing, subnets, VLANs etc.) Solid understanding of Linux-based operating systems (deployment and configuration) and cluster management; must be able to deply and manage containers, Kubernetes and Slurm clusters Familiarity of AI Technologies e.g. Generative/Cognitive AI framework/models, Machine Learning/Deep Learning, Large Language Models (LLMs) AI platforms/libraries (e.g. Hugging Face, TensorFlow) and Open-Source ML frameworks (PyTorch) Excellent collaboration, communication and presentation skills; must be able to work with all levels of the organization and effectively communicate status of development work to relevant stakeholders in a consistent and timely manner Desirable Requirements Degree in a quantitative field (Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, Electrical Engineering, Physical Sciences, etc.) Who we are We believe that each of us has the power to make an impact. That’s why we put our team members at the center of everything we do. If you’re looking for an opportunity to grow your career with some of the best minds and most advanced tech in the industry, we’re looking for you. Dell Technologies is a unique family of businesses that helps individuals and organizations transform how they work, live and play. Join us to build a future that works for everyone because Progress Takes All of Us. Dell Technologies is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all employees and to providing employees with a work environment free of discrimination and harassment. Read the full Equal Employment Opportunity Policy here . Job ID: R237435 Dell’s Flexible & Hybrid Work Culture At Dell Technologies, we believe our best work is done when flexibility is offered. We know that freedom and flexibility are crucial to all our employees no matter where you are located and our flexible and hybrid work style allows team members to have the freedom to ideate, be innovative, and drive results their way. To learn more about our work culture, please visit our locations page.
